page.title: 14VANDALISM IN NORTH HOLMWOOD
page.content: Crime watch by some junior children. We saw a Duck lying dead in a pond with a blood stained rock nearby. It had been beaten to death,it was horrible. The subway under the A24 road is always being covered in graffiti some of it is funny but mostly it is rude. Our school has been vandalised many times recently. Our swimming pool was wrecked. Bricks were thrown in the water and chemicals that keep the pool clean were thrown about. The polystyrene covers were taken off and the pool lost its heat. We could not go swimming for several days. A burning mat was placed outside the First School one evening in an attempt to burn it down. Dogs and even humans have been fouling in the porches and play areas of the school.
